title: Properties of Absolute Values
text: Because the inequality takes the absolute value of $$x-8$$, $$|x-8|$$ will always be greater than or equal to $$0$$.
speech: Because the inequality takes the absolute value of  x minus 8 , , the absolute value of x minus 8, end absolute value  will always be greater than or equal to  0 .
